body:
Hey Guys ,
I try to use the option *--override* with *kubectl expose* .
First i did this and it work :
```
kubectl run test-nginx-metadata --image=nginx --replicas=2 --port=80 --expose --service-overrides='{ "metadata": { "annotations": { "zone-context": "home" } } } '
```
Now i want to add another *service* with *kubectl expose*
and this command does not work
```
kubectl expose deployment test-nginx-metadata  --port=1000 --target-port=80 --type=NodePort --name=test-nginx-metadata-srv-2 --overrides='{ "apiVersion": "v1" , "kind": "Service" , "metadata": { "annotations": { "zone-context": "work" } } } '
```
I have this error
```
error: no kind "Service" is registered for the internal version of group "" in scheme "k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/kubectl/scheme/scheme.go:28"
```
If i remove *--overrides* the command work .



```
kubectl version
Client Version: version.Info{Major:"1", Minor:"13", GitVersion:"v1.13.1", GitCommit:"eec55b9ba98609a46fee712359c7b5b365bdd920", GitTreeState:"clean", BuildDate:"2018-12-13T19:44:19Z", GoVersion:"go1.11.2", Compiler:"gc", Platform:"darwin/amd64"}
Server Version: version.Info{Major:"1", Minor:"13", GitVersion:"v1.13.1", GitCommit:"eec55b9ba98609a46fee712359c7b5b365bdd920", GitTreeState:"clean", BuildDate:"2018-12-13T10:31:33Z", GoVersion:"go1.11.2", Compiler:"gc", Platform:"linux/amd64"}
````

title: kubectl expose --overrides : what field are missing ?
